description: This file defines a Python class 'DockerApiClient' that provides methods to create and manage a Docker API client, including handling connection errors and logging.

classes.name: DockerApiClient
classes.description: A class that manages Docker API client creation and connection handling.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the DockerApiClient with optional base_url and timeout.

methods.name: create_api_client
methods.description: Creates and returns a Docker client, handling connection errors and logging.

methods.name: api_client
methods.description: Property that returns the Docker API client, creating it if necessary.
